name: Energy Detection
description: Detect the amplitude of each frequency band, sort from low frequency to high frequency, and divide the detected frequency band into 8 output ranges.

inputs.name: Audio
inputs.description: The audio stream you want to detect the energy

outputs.name: Audio
outputs.description: Execute this node,  connect to a speaker to play the audio stream or connect to a Detection Output to finish the connect without play audio

outputs.name: Band 1
outputs.description: Energy detection result in this frequency range

outputs.name: Band 2
outputs.description: Energy detection result in this frequency range

outputs.name: Band 3
outputs.description: Energy detection result in this frequency range

outputs.name: Band 4
outputs.description: Energy detection result in this frequency range

outputs.name: Band 5
outputs.description: Energy detection result in this frequency range

outputs.name: Band 6
outputs.description: Energy detection result in this frequency range

outputs.name: Band 7
outputs.description: Energy detection result in this frequency range

outputs.name: Band 8
outputs.description: Energy detection result in this frequency range
